channel.title: Npc teleblock player
channel.description: is this possible that an npc can teleblock a player? because i want to do that either that or freeze them , if anyone help i will apreciate it, thanks

NPCHandler.java:348: cannot find symbol symbol : variable teleblock location: class NPCHandler teleblock = false; ^ NPCHandler.java:351: cannot find symbol symbol : variable teleblock location: class NPCHandler teleblock = true; ^ Note: stream.java uses or overrides a deprecated API. @Project_Evolution wrote:

public void uberentangle() { EntangleDelay = 55; }

        public int EntangleDelay = 0;

Declare that in client.java, then declare this in boolean process(),

if(EntangleDelay > 0) EntangleDelay -= 1;

item.title: Npc teleblock player
item.dc:creator: @Project_Evolution Project Evolution
item.description:
@Project_Evolution wrote:

Ok I really want to help, so il give it a shot.

Search for this in your NpcHandler.java,

if (npcs[NPCID].npcType == ##

Replace ## with your NPC ID.
Ok so once you find your NPC then replace its damages animation and damage with this,

hitDiff = 10 + misc.random(40); npcs[NPCID].animNumber = 81; //has u mon p.stillgfx(395, p.absY, p.absX); castOnPlayer.uberentangle(); plr.sendMessage("You have been frozen!");

So it looks like this,

if (npcs[NPCID].npcType == ## hitDiff = 10 + misc.random(40); npcs[NPCID].animNumber = 81; //has u mon p.stillgfx(395, p.absY, p.absX); castOnPlayer.uberentangle(); plr.sendMessage("You have been frozen!");

So obviously if your NPC is like a Devolutions “Dad” NPC, dont replace evrything just the attack and the attack GFX*(Like I said above). And you can change the amount it hits too. :rolleyes: Sorry but you will probably have to change the freeze GFX, take a look at it at work but your decision.

Any errors please post. :eek:

Read full topic
